import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Auth.css'; const RestaurantsHome = () => { const location = useLocation(); const [active, setActive] = useState('Delivery'); let outletArray = ['Bakery', 'Beverage Shop', 'Café', 'Casual Dining', 'Club', 'Cocktail Bar']; let categoryArray = ['Afghan', 'African', 'American', 'Andhra', 'Arabian', 'Armenian']; return (

{`Food ${active} in ${location.pathname.split('/')[2]}`}

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

Explore by category

    {categoryArray?.map(category =>
  • {category}
    • )}

Explore by outlet

    {outletArray?.map(outlet =>
  • {outlet}
    • )}
) } export default RestaurantsHome;
